synopsis.text: Graduation project of three talented students from the National Taiwan University of Arts, this anime follows the journey of a young, visually impaired girl named Chico. When her purse is snatched in the middle of the day, her loyal guide dog, Gogo, chases after the thief, leading Chico away from her familiar surroundings and into an unknown world. As she navigates through this unfamiliar terrain, Chico must rely on her other senses and her vivid imagination to guide her. With soft, pastel hues and simple yet captivating designs, the anime beautifully depicts Chico's magical adventure, highlighting the joys and wonders that can be discovered through non-visual senses. Prepare to be enchanted as you embark on this heartwarming journey with Chico and Gogo.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
